SNKRT 103 Elemetary Sanskrit (5) C. COX, R. SALOMON
Basic grammar and vocabulary of the classical language. Reading of elementary texts from the epic or Puranic literature. Third in a sequence of three.

SNKRT 402 Intermediate Sanskrit (5) VLPA Cox, Salomon
Further study of classical grammar; introduction to classical literature and Vedic language and texts. Second in a sequence of three. Offered: W.
